originalText.text: Quant Solutions is a trusted partner of ours and we've been working with them for years. They provide bookkeeping and advisory services to a wide range of clients. We're always impressed with their professionalism, efficiency and expertise in their field. They use our Dryrun software to manage their clients' cash flow and help them with financial planning and analysis. They have also shared their insights and recommendations on how we can enhance our product and user experience. We highly recommend Jeanine and her team to anyone who needs dependable and reliable bookkeeping services!

text.text: Quant Solutions is a trusted partner of ours and we've been working with them for years. They provide bookkeeping and advisory services to a wide range of clients. We're always impressed with their professionalism, efficiency and expertise in their field. originalText.text: Have been using Quant Solutions to help run our small business's financial operations for many years now. We've grown and shrunk, had many ups and downs during that time, and they are always there helping us in whatever ways they can. Very flexible and accommodating in whatever ways possible. Willing to take on more or less depending on what we need and what we can afford. Pricing is very fair and reasonable. Availability is very good, given what their role is. Could not be where we are without them and have enjoyed working together! Definitely recommend.

originalText.text: Charging $1000 a month for accounting services is in and of itself an enormous amount of money, but particularly so for a small business. A wildly unprofessional company willing to take advantage of people.

originalText.text: Great work, excellent option for outsourcing accounting
